input.sentences: the whole office was involved in the holiday fun .
people brought their furry friends to the festivities .
food was eventually served and the office gathered .
conversations and laughs abounded on this fun work day .
output.sentences: Today was Halloween and I had to work at the office.
Everybody came in costume, including Jim from accounting.
He even brought his dog to go as part of his costume.
The costume contest was intense this year and everybody worked hard to win.
But at the end of the day it was still just another day at the office.
